name: Hudolus Dungeon - Beta
description:
Just a Beta, we'll keep updating it whenever possible. It's a Top down 2d shooter, your objective is to kill everything, move with "WASD"  and shoot with "Left mouse button".

Made by:

-Gabriel Oliveira Simões;

-Lucas Franca;

-Victor Sagava;

With a little help from "blackthornprod" tutorials -> https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Z1XWw1kmnvOOFsj6Bzy2g
